message: Let's split the money. I get $60, you get $40. It's better to take this deal now before inflation eats away at our potential gains.
I think we can do better than that. Let's split the money more evenly. I'll take $55, and you can have $45. We still have time to make a deal before inflation hits too hard.
Bob, inflation is eating our money! This is getting us nowhere. I'm offering you $45, I'll take $55.  Let's close the deal now before it gets even worse.
